response.original_title: Michael Jackson: The Magic Continues on Tour
response.overview: "Michael Jackson: The Magic Continues on Tour" is an 1988 documentary produced during the Bad World Tour. Mixing concert highlights, travel footage, and interview segments, it provided an in-depth look at the scale and atmosphere of Jacksonâ€™s first solo world tour. Although very little is known today about its original broadcast or distribution. Surviving evidence confirms that "The Magic Continues on Tour" served as the source production later re-edited into multiple specials, including "MTV Special, Michael Jackson: The Magic Continues on Tour", "NBC Friday Night Videos, Michael Jackson: Around the World", and "BBC Behind the Beat, Michael Jackson: The Magic Continues on Tour".
